Text: will this play karaoke songs that are stored on ur hard drive......or does it only play cds? any info would be gr8.......thanx :)

Karafun is a freeware that you can download from their website that homebrewer2 listed on here,so I dont think that a password is required.It plays karaoke files stored on ur hard drive and I believe it plays discs aswell.

@fredpc, i down loaded the program from their site and it's great. it plays from your hard drive and cds/dvd. most options are available (a lot more than one would think for being free). if you want to use the program to convert your file(s) to avi, wmv, wav and/or wma you need to buy it otherwise it will convert but at really low quality.
